Interface to the Harwell-Boeing driver in C (iohb.c)

Parameters filename - Path to the file to read from Nrow - Number of rows Ncol - Number of columns Nnzero - Number of non zeros col - Index of first element of each column in row and val row - Row of eah element val - Value of each element Type - Type of the matrix RhsType - Type of the right hand side.
